label: chimera
description:
Chimera is the update to Halo Custom Edition/Halo Combat Evolved for PC that
        we should have had but never got.
author: Kavawuvi

label: dsoal
description:
It implements the
        DirectSound interfaces by translating the calls to OpenAL, and fools
        applications into thinking there is a hardware accelerated sound device.
author: kcat

label: hrp
description: Discord Rich Presence for Halo Custom Edition
author: giraffe
